abilities.name: Gilded Imprints
abilities.details: Everett's basic attacks, Sunfire Volley and Brilliant Dawn embed Golden Needles on the target that stacks infinitely. Killing the enemy target will return all the Golden Needles back to him, earning him bonus gold depending on the number of returned needles.

abilities.name: Sunfire Volley
abilities.details:
Everett throws three needles in a target direction, each dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to the first enemy hit.

When shielded, Everett will throw five needles instead.

abilities.name: Golden Ward
abilities.details:
Everett places a Golden Ward at a target location, granting vision in a small area for a long duration. Once Everett enters the range of a Golden Ward, it will activate, expanding the range, but will be removed after a few seconds.

While Everett is within range of a Golden Ward, his basic attacks deal bonus physical damage (scaling with physical power) and apply an additional Golden Needle stack.

abilities.name: Auric Thread
abilities.details:
Everett pulls back all the Golden Needles, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) based on the number of needles pulled back.

When shielded, the damage is increased based on Everett's critical strike chance.

If an enemy is killed by this ability, Gilded Imprints's bonus gold gain will still be triggered.

abilities.name: Brilliant Dawn
abilities.details:
Everett channels the full power of his golden essence, gaining bonus attack range, attack speed and empowering his basic attacks to pierce through all enemies in a line.

If Everett is shielded while in this state, he will gain bonus physical power. If the shield expires or is broken, the bonus stats will be lost.
